originalText.text: I ordered earrings from them for a little girl . The gold flowers were enormous rediculous looking.  No cash return only credit. At the same time I ordered a bracelet for my daughter one month ago.  Now it’s on back order.  I want my money back.  This was a birthday gift for my daughter.  I would not purchase anything from this company if I were you. They are terrible

originalText.text:
If I could give 0 stars I would
This is probably the WORST company I have ever dealt with. The jewelry looks beautiful and it comes and it is beautiful-
BUT you wear it for 2 weeks and it turns colors-
I paid 100 for a silver chain bracelet and it turned copper and it looks awful! So I sent it back to the repair and NOW they want 50 for the repair ??? I paid 100 had it for 2 weeks and they want more money?
I’m shocked !!
Please DO NOT BUY anything -
Piece of garbage -
Again 2 weeks -??!!!

originalText.text: Your return policy is the absolute worst and you should be ashamed to work for for a horrible company. If I return something and get a store credit, I am unable to use any discounts to make my next purchase? And I’m responsible for shipping. This is the worst customer service return policy that I have ever dealt with.

text.text: Your return policy is the absolute worst and you should be ashamed to work for for a horrible company. If I return something and get a store credit, I am unable to use any discounts to make my next purchase? And I’m responsible for shipping. This is the worst customer service return policy that I have ever dealt with.

originalText.text: I'm mistakenly brought the wrong chain from this company. It's been a horrible experience trying to get my money back witch I never got my money back or store credit, they kept my $166. Be careful dealing with this company, they are thieves. Customer service is Horrible at best!!! Don't buy anything from this company if you ask me!
